title: A1502 board compatibility
message:
I have compared these 3 boards: 

820-3536
820-3476
820-4924

All these board al interchangable?

title: A1502 board compatibility
message: 820-3536 and 820-3476 are interchangeable (as far as I know--we use the same test cases for them without issues--someone will correct me if I'm wrong, but we've noticed there are no issues). The 820-4924 uses a different trackpad connector, so it's not interchangeable.

title: A1502 board compatibility
message: 4924 also will not work with older screen

title: A1502 board compatibility
message:
100% 820-3536 and 820-3476 are interchangeable??
Can somebody confirm that??
